name: Squareroot Mining
description:
Description
Made for Ludum Dare 48, first playable version made in 3 days
Control the roots of a tree that need ores to survive, go to the deepest point to get better ores and survive for the most time

How to play
Each resource has a different rarity in each of the main layers of the world, and adds a different amount of lifetime for your tree.
To control your tree, hold ARROWS or WASD, it will take a different time for your root to break depending on the material.
If the sound is too loud, use M/N to mute/unmute
Extra optmized!
